article:
This article is an index of 'characters appearing in the [[Shakespeare's
plays|plays]] of [[William Shakespeare]]' whose names begin with the letters A
to K. Characters with names beginning with the letters L to Z may be found .

NOTE: ''Characters who exist outside Shakespeare are marked "(hist)" where they
      are historical, and "(myth)" where they are mythical. Where that
      annotation is a link (e.g. (hist)), it is a link to the page for the
      historical or mythical figure. The annotation "(fict)" is only used in
      entries for the English history plays, and indicates a character who is
      fictional.

'Contents:' A | B | C | D | E | F | G | H | I | J | K | | | | | | | | | | | | |
| Sources | Links __NOTOC__
categories: Lists of fictional characters by writer
